content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Area at (0,0)
Consists of two furnaces for smelting iron:
- Stone furnace at (0.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron ore processing
- Stone furnace at (2.0, 0.0) with coal fuel and iron ore processing

### Copper Smelting Area at (4,4)
Consists of two furnaces for smelting copper:
- Stone furnace at (4.0, 4.0) 
- Stone furnace at (6.0, 4.0)

### Power Generation System at (-2.5,24)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (-2.5, 24.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5, 24.5)
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipe network carrying water
- Currently not functioning due to lack of fuel in boiler

### Inserter Assembly Line at (23.5,2.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at (23.5, 2.5) configured to craft inserters
- Input chest at (26.5, 2.5) containing iron gear wheels and electronic circuits
- Output chest at (20.5, 2.5)
- Two burner inserters:
  - At (21.5, 2.5) moving items from assembler to output chest
  - At (25.5, 2.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Currently not operating due to lack of power

### Power Distribution Network
Electricity grid (id 14902) with multiple electric poles distributed across positions:
- (12.5,16.5)
- (4.5,19.5)
- (8.5,18.5)
- (22.5,11.5)
- (4.5,13.5)
- (8.5,14.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Issues
- Ensure boiler has constant fuel supply to maintain power generation
- Connect all electrical entities to the power network through electric poles

### Resource Management Issues
- Check inventory before attempting to insert items into machines/chests
- Maintain adequate supplies of raw materials (iron ore, copper ore) for continuous production
- Keep track of coal levels for burner inserters and furnaces

### Production Flow Issues
- Ensure all components of production chains are properly connected and powered
- Monitor input/output chest contents to prevent production stoppages
- Keep assembling machines supplied with all required ingredients

### Inventory Management
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting crafting operations
- Maintain buffer stocks of commonly used materials
